item.title: Set THM Walkthrough
item.description: Set Set is a 90 points machine on TryHackMe developed and created by 4nqr34z and Omarbdrn. The Initial Foothold is about finding usernames and password spraying; later, we grab the NTLMv2 hash using responder, crack it, and get a Winrm session. For root, we exploit Veeam One Agent Service, by customizing Metasploit’s exploit. Later in the walkthrough, we will learn unintended solutions and different techniques to grab NTLMv2 in the latest Windows Domain Controller and the latest Windows patch.
